functions.name: uuid
functions.description: Returns a random UUID according to RFC 4122. utils.uuid()

functions.name: encodeBase64
functions.description: encodeBase64 returns a base 64 encoded bytes of the input.  utils.encodeBase64(corece.ToBytes("Hello World"))

functions.name: decodeBase64
functions.description: decodeBase64 returns the bytes represented by the base 64 encoded input.  utils.decodeBase64(corece.ToBytes("SGVsbG8sIFdvcmxk"))
